messages.original: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu characterised yesterday's attacks on Nasser Medical Centre in southern Gaza that killed 20 people, including 5 journalists, as a "mishap", claiming that Israel "values the work of journalists, medical staff, and and‚Ä¶

Remember, local journalists cover the Israeli genocide and ethnic cleansing of Gaza in real time. They are the biggest threat to Israel's coordinated propaganda and disinformation effort. 
As for health workers, not a single hospital in Gaza remains fully functioning. The ones which remain are low on supplies and can't treat everyone. They also face constant threats from evacuation orders, and "mishaps" like what we witnessed yesterday.

Consequences of Russian Geran-2 drone strikes on the Novhorod-Sivers'kyi area of Chernihiv Oblast. The photo shows a damaged gas station, although there is a large communication tower just 100 metres away which was likely the target. 
Coordinates: 52.013457, 33.181744

I have added a new experimental layer to my interactive map showing important events from the past 24 hours. I can't promise this will always be a thing, but I want to try it out and see how it goes. You can toggle this in the layers menu. 
Map link: 
https://www.google.com/maps/d/u/0/edit?hl=en&mid=1thW9kqnDOaS2lAepLhLdzSX8Ur9Sc4k&ll=48.84612452870563%2C33.13682716297465&z=7

Following the Ukrainian infiltration into Myrne, reserve units from the Russian 51st Guards Combined Arms Army have been deployed to the area to clear it of a Ukrainian presence. The goal will be to drive them back over the Kazenyi Torets River and unblock the T-0504 Pokrovsk - Kostyantynivka Highway which is likely not being used at this moment.
Ukrainian sabotage and reconnaissance activity is ongoing in Malynivka.

Russian forces have captured the village of Zaporizke, Pokrovske direction, Dnipropetrovsk Oblast.
Pre-war population: ~103.
Total land area: ~0.85km¬≤.

Our team has geolocated footage!
LONG FOOTAGE ANALYSIS 
Footage released by the Russian 
144th Motorized Rifle Division
 showcases the 
destruction
 of Ukrainian Forces of the 
3rd Separate Assault Brigade "Azov"
 during their fighting for the settlement of 
Novomikhailovka
. A truck filled with Ukrainian Soldiers is recorded driving down from 
Novy Mir
 and passing the settlement of 
Novomikhailovka
 where it disembarks the squad of Ukrainian Infantry and departs. The truck is struck twice by FPV Drones and is promptly destroyed and abandoned while turning back to exit the area. Later footage in the video showcases the 
elimination of many Ukrainian Azov Fighters
 as they attempt to hold onto the treeline south of 
Novomikhailovka
.
(1/2)

 showcases the

The 3rd Separate Assault Brigade "Azov" claims to have inflicted heavy losses on Russian Forces during the course of the battle for the settlement. These claims however, are unfounded with proof and it seems that Azov took extreme losses in order to enter and capture the settlement. It is unknown whether all Azov fighters were eliminated during the attack, meaning the settlement is most likely under the control of Ukrainian Forces.
(2/2)

Site of the drone crash in Tartu County, Estonia.
Local authorities stated that the drone is not related to Russia and is most likely a Ukrainian kamikaze drone that was flying to strike Russian territory.
Pretty much confirms that Ukraine or the west is using NATO territory and airspace to deliver kamikaze drones to Russian infrastructure. We also saw how during the spiderweb operation ‚ÄúUkrainian intelligence‚Äù smuggled parts in through NATO countries. 
We wonder why Russia didn‚Äôt want Georgia or Ukraine to join NATO 
ü§£
